name: Spearhead [Commodore 64]
description:
THIS GAME WORKS ON PAL MACHINES ONLY

The second place winner of the Official C64 SEUCK Compo 2020

Spearhead is a horizontal scrolling shoot 'em up originally created using the Sideways Scrolling Shoot Em Up Construction Kit. This game features a brand new front end presentation, with some cool music. There are also some nice in game enhancements added to the game also.

Your mission is to fly across enemy base and do battle against the alien enemy forces. At the end of each mission, you must shoot an enemy base to move on to the next mission. Collect power ups to upgrade/downgrade your fire power. Can you defeat the enemy empire, or will you be shot in the butt?

Good luck pilot.

CREDITS:

Game Design, Graphics and Sound Effects by Alf Yngve
(Using Sideways scrolling SEUCK)

Additional programming and tape loader system by Martin Piper and Richard Bayliss

Music composed by Richard Bayliss

(C)2020 Alf Yngve for The New Dimension as part of the Official C64 SEUCK Compo 2020
